definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

pinyin: Ai4 de2 hua2 · Da2 la1 di4

definition: Prince Edward Island, province of Canada

pinyin: Ai4 de2 hua2 Wang2 zi3 Dao3

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, Edward was very fond of cooking and foodstuff.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，愛德華非常喜歡烹飪和食品。

sentences.english: Edmond, you have a very beautiful lady-love.
sentences.chinese: 愛德蒙你擁有一位如花似玉的愛人。

sentences.english: I'm Edwin. I'll show you to your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我是愛德溫，我帶你去旅館。

sentences.english: At Lava Hot Springs in Idaho, visitors may bathe in the thermal mineral waters.
sentences.chinese: 當熱熔岩在愛德荷州爆發，參觀者可以去那裏泡溫泉。

sentences.english: The abbé sank upon Edmond's bed. while Edmond himself remained standing.
sentences.chinese: 神甫就勢倒在愛德蒙的牀上休息，而愛德蒙仍然站着。

sentences.english: The abbé sank upon Edmond's bed. while Edmond himself remained standing.
sentences.chinese: 神甫就勢倒在愛德蒙的牀上休息，而愛德蒙仍然站着。

sentences.english: He spoke out against the excesses of King Edward II.
sentences.chinese: 他公然反對國王愛德華二世的暴政。

sentences.english: The wedding of Prince Edouard and his bride was a far more low-key affair however with only a few hundred people turning out onto the streets to watch them.
sentences.chinese: 愛德華王子的婚禮低調得多，僅有幾百人沿街觀看。

sentences.english: Edward always gets heebie jeebies from deadlines.
sentences.chinese: 愛德華總是對截止日期神經過敏。

sentences.english: The Rising Sun was the badge of Edward III.
Every time I watched this movie, my tears welled up in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 在看《剪刀手愛德華》時，淚水模糊了我的視線。

sentences.english: I acquit Edward of all essential misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 我原諒愛德華的所有根本過錯。

sentences.english: The same applies to pressure ulcers, says Edwards.
sentences.chinese: 愛德華茲說這同樣適用於壓力潰瘍。

sentences.english: Mrs. Ferrars can never forget that Edward is her son.
sentences.chinese: 費拉斯太太決不會忘記愛德華是她的兒子。

sentences.english: The next day, Ed visited a famous statesman who was respected by people.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，愛德拜訪了一位著名的人民愛戴的政治家。

definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
Fabi, first currency issued by the 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] in 1935, in use until 1948
term of office/while holding a post
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
